about_the_game:
Serving coffee in complete chaos, "Coffee, Plis" shows a crazy day of service in all the coffee shops in the city. Being able to play alone or with friends all you have to do is serve customers as quickly as possible.

Work as a team

Being able to play with up to 4 players, synchronization is essential, because in this game, more players make the challenge of not making a big mess even greater!



Find your style of seeing to customers

Pay attention to customers and their behavior, as each one has their own way of dealing with the wait. The only thing that is certain is that everyone loves a hot cup of coffee (yes, the coffee gets cold, so be quick).





Be ready for anything!

Serving is naturally challenging, and it gets even worse at peak hours, with a random customer system every time you start a game it will be a new experience. Various types of orders and a high chance of dropping everything will make customers furious! Be very attentive! Don’t screw up, new kid!



Increasing challenges

The more stars you earn from customer reviews, the more challenges are unlocked, testing your skill even more, have fun finding out your limits!

name: Coffee, Plis

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIN7-64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i3-2100 / AMD A8-5600k
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 630 / Radeon HD 6570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Win7 -64 bit
  • Processor: Intel i5-650 / AMD A10-5800K
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 / Radeon HD 7510

short_description: A Young man gets to fill in for his colleagues at a large cafeteria franchise as his first job, but things spiral out of control when he discovers chaos, also known as rush hour.
